text: @narendramodi @AlsisiOfficial I have done 2 bookings through make my trip,  worth around Rs 80K, now  due to COVID-19 when I am trying to cancel the bookings then amount is not getting transferred to bank account through which payment has been done whereas MMT only allowing to get it refund to MMT Wallet.
